text: قَالُواْ سَنُرَٰوِدُ عَنۡهُ أَبَاهُ وَإِنَّا لَفَٰعِلُونَ

translation.en: They said, "We will attempt to dissuade his father from [keeping] him, and indeed, we will do [it]
translation.id: Mereka berkata, "Kami akan membujuk ayahnya (untuk membawanya) dan kami benar-benar akan melaksanakannya
